content.name: com.microchip.mcu32.mplabx.project.touch_apps_onboard_sensor_two_button_sam_d11_xpro
content.displayName: Onboard Multiple Touch Button Example for SAM D09/D10/D11 Family
content.shortDescription: MPLAB Harmony 3 Touch Library is a royalty-free software library for developing touch applications on 32-bit microcontrollers using the Peripheral Touch Controller (PTC). Developers can use it to integrate touch-sensing capability into their applications. This example application shows how to use onboard multi touch button.
content.author: Microchip
subcategories: SAM D11 Xplained Pro Evaluation Kit
